data.actual_result: Discord crashes/restarts if you try to leave the menu quickly using Discord's back button
data.expected_result: You should leave the menu without any crashes
data.short_description: Quickly leaving the Vanity URL menu using Discord's back button after trying to set an invalid link crashes the client
data.steps_to_repro: - Have admin permissions on a partnered server, so you get access to the Vanity URL menu - Input a link that exceeds the URLs character limit - Accept the changes using your keyboard's enter key - Leave the menu quickly using the arrow at the top left corner (Important: Not your phone's back button)
